import React from 'react'; import { HiArrowNarrowRight, HiArrowRight } from 'react-icons/hi'; import me from '../assets/me.png'; import { Link } from "react-scroll"; const Home =()=> { return (

Software Developer with specialization in Game Development.

I am a software developer with a major in Game Development. Currently, I am working as an intern in Federal police Limburg, Belgium. I have made small projects in varities of game engines, such as Unreal engine 4/5, unity engine, overlord engine and custom made engines.

About Me
`
); }; export default Home;
